Type.Name: TreeViewColumnDropFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool TreeViewColumnDropFunc(TreeView tree_view, TreeViewColumn column, TreeViewColumn prev_column, TreeViewColumn next_column);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A delegate type to specify a function signature for saying where a dragged column may be dropped.
Docs.remarks: See for more details on how this delegate should be used.
